Connected frontends with GraphQL or REST APIs.
Created views using Bootstrap and customized styling for Openvia.

experiences.content:
# Frontend Engineer at Openvia

## Role Overview
As a Frontend Engineer at Openvia, I have been responsible for designing, creating, and maintaining architecture for various projects using React and Typescript, from the initial commit until deployment.

## Key Achievements

### Project Development
- Designed and maintained project architecture using React and Typescript.
- Connected frontends with GraphQL or REST APIs.
- Created views using Bootstrap and customized styling.

### Legacy Maintenance
- Maintained legacy projects using Ionic, Angular, Vanilla JS, HTML, CSS, and Ajax.

### Agile and Quality Assurance
- Worked using agile methodology.
- Ensured code quality with Sonarqube and Jest.

### DevOps
- Used Jenkins, Docker, and AWS to keep projects live.
- Developed projects from scratch.

achievements: Gained experience working on a web-based project using React and JavaScript.
Became proficient in unit testing, code reviews, and utilizing React component libraries like Material UI.
Created new features and attended meetings with project clients using Jira tickets on a Kanban board.
Developed software engineering and communication skills, while improving English language proficiency.
experiences.content:
# Software Engineer (Trainee) at Neoception

## Role Overview
As a Junior Software Engineer at Neoception, I gained experience working on a web-based project using React and JavaScript.

## Key Achievements

### Project Development
- Worked on a web-based project using React and JavaScript.
- Created new features and attended client meetings using Jira tickets on a Kanban board.

### Skill Development
- Became proficient in unit testing and code reviews.
- Utilized React component libraries like Material UI.
- Improved software engineering and communication skills.
- Enhanced English language proficiency.
